1.title: Alt går galt for Rasmus

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

1.plot: Joakim Inversen hires the YouTuber Rasmus Brohave on trial, in the hope that he can be his temp on DR Ultra's new summer program "Den store sommertour". As a test he sends Rasmus on a mission to Tivoli with and empty script.

2.title: Casper smadrer børn

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

2.plot: Despite the hassle with his first program Rasmus lands the job as host, so Joakim sends him to the trampoline park Xjump. Here his friend Casper shows up unannounced and mess up the program.

3.title: Den store blender challenge

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

3.plot: Joakim agrees that Casper can become Rasmus' co-host, so together they drive to the aquarium to produce today's program.

4.title: Casper tømmer dankortet

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

4.plot: Rasmus and Casper travel to the legendary land of Lejre. Casper has misunderstood what it's all about and arrive dressed up as Gandalf.

5.title: Casper slår Rasmus ihjel?

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

5.plot: Rasmus is furious that Casper has spent 12.000 kr. on souvenirs, and nervous on how Joakim will react to the news. Today they go to the Zoo to investigate how dangerous the wolf is. While in the Zoo Casper makes a fatal mistake.

6.title: Casper skal på date

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

6.plot: Casper receives a message from a girl who has seen him on TV, and he immediately arrange a date. The date results in Casper getting his own love mailbox. Rasmus goes water skiing.

7.title: Vil du have likes eller venner?

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

7.plot: Casper is happy because his gained new followers, and he's certain that this TV show will make him as famous as Rasmus. With the fame comes some challenges behind the scenes, which has an impact on their show.

8.title: Casper er en stor idiot

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

8.plot: Casper is still high on all the followers and likes he gets, so he's created a new fitness character, which will come in handy in today's episode, where Rasmus and Casper look at activities you can do in a swimming pool.

9.title: Sure tæer i ostepops

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

9.plot: The mood between Rasmus and Casper is a bit gloomy, so Casper decides to show Joakim that he can do the show without Rasmus, so while taping at a LAN party he eliminates Rasmus.

10.title: Til grin på live TV

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

10.plot: Joakim is not happy with Rasmus after he slept during the last show. Casper continues to pull pranks on Rasmus, while they visit the hard rock festival Copenhell.

11.title: Rasmus Bar-mave

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

11.plot: Joakim has become really fond of Casper, and believe he's doing a great job as host. Rasmus feel left out and secretly records a video intending to show all the bad sides of Casper.

12.title: Skræmt til døde!

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

12.plot: When Joakim watches the secret video of Casper, who misbehaves in front of the entire team, he decides to lay off Casper, but only after they complete today's episode which takes place at Egeskov castle.

13.title: Et rigtigt lortejob

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

13.plot: After laying off Casper, Rasmus get the YouTuber Kristine Sloth a new co-host. At first they seem to be a perfect match, but Rasmus misses Casper.

14.title: Den store sovsedyst

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

14.plot: Kristine has more or less taken over the show, it's obvious who is in charge, and Joakim loves her. Rasmus is annoyed and tries to get it touch with Casper to get him back on the show.

15.title: Rasmus in da Lego House!

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

15.plot: With Kristine leaving the show, Rasmus is on his own. He confess his wrongdoing to Joakim. Joakim is upset but give Rasmus a final chance to prove that he's the right one for the job.

16.title: Desperat jagt

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

16.plot: Todays trip goes to the Wadden Sea. Joakim want Casper back on the show. Rasmus feel bad for what he has done, so he's doing all he can to get in touch with Casper.

17.title: Stupidaagaards fanget og bundet?!

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

17.plot: While the search for Casper continues, Joakim have found a new co-host to assist Rasmus. In today's show Rasmus and Kristian visit a motocross circuit.

18.title: Bubber smadrer Brohave

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

18.plot: Rasmus and Kristian goes camping, but before they leave Rasmus goes shopping. In the store he run into Casper and finally have the chance to apologize.

19.title: Vild med Røv-Dans

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

19.plot: Rasmus return to the store to try to convince Casper to get back on the show. In today's show they visit a dance school where they try to learn to break-dance.

20.title: BBFS Forever

episode of.title: Brohave og Harding på tur (TV Mini-Series 2018)

20.plot: Rasmus and Casper visit a wellness center to film the last episode for the summer tour. Joakim has 3 challenges for them while there.

imdb.title: Brohave og Harding på tur
plot: Joakim dreams of having a vacation so he has hired Rasmus and Casper to take over his job as host on DR Ultra during the summer. It soon turn out that handling the summer reporting is not as easy as it may sound, and Joakim has to step in.::Floydian <contact@floyd.dk>
